Woodbridge Township, with a population of 100,421 is New Jersey's fifth largest municipality.
The Township consists of 10 communities





1. [Mayor John E. McCormac](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/342/Mayor-John-E-McCormac)

   1. [About Mayor McCormac](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/714/About-Mayor-McCormac)
   2. [Mayor's Advisory Committee](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/608/Mayors-Advisory-Committee)
   3. [2025 State of the Township Address](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/1271/2025-State-of-the-Township-Address)
   4. [Mayor's Summer Concert Series](https://woodbridgenjmusic.com/)
   5. [2024 Mayoral Inauguration](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/1323/2024-Mayoral-Inauguration)
